required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Characteristics and Safety After Administration of NVP-2002
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Clinical Trial to Compare and Evaluate the Pharmacokinetic Characteristics and Safety After Administration of NVP-2002 and Co-administration of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002-R2 in Healthy Adult Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare and evaluate the pharmacokinetic characteristics and safety after administration of NVP-2002 and co-administration of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002-R2 in healthy adult volunteers.

detailed_description.textblock: Phase 1 to evaluate the pharmacokinetic characteristics and safety after administration of NVP-2002 and co-administration of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002-R2. Which is designed as ramdomized, oral, single dose, 2×2 crossover.

primary_outcome.description: Area under the curve of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002-R2

arm_group.description: single tablets of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002-R2 followed by NVP-2002 FDC, fasted condition
NVP-2002 FDC followed by single tablets of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002-R2, fasted condition
single tablets of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002-R2 followed by NVP-2002 FDC, fasted condition
NVP-2002 FDC followed by single tablets of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002-R2, fasted condition

intervention.description: NVP-2002-R1 1 tablet, once daily and NVP-2002-R2 1 tablet, once daily
NVP-2002 is a combination of NVP-2002-R1 and NVP-2002_R2 NVP-2002, 1 tablet, once daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- healthy adult subjects who signed informed consent
- Body Mass Index(BMI)=18.5~29.9kg/㎡
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects participated in another clinical trial within 6 months prior to administration of the study drug
- Inadequate subject for the clinical trial by the investigator's decision
- Upper Limits of Normal x 1.5 < Aspartate transaminase(AST), Alanine transminase(ALT), Total bilirubin
